COMBAT[Shrumal_Ogre]: SIDESLASH | UPSLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | FULLDASHSLASH | ANYDASHSLASH + DASHMASTER + OBSCURESKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS
COMBAT[Glimback]: UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | SPELLS
COMBAT[Durandoo]: ACID + UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | (FIREBALL + $CASTSPELL[2] | SCREAM + $CASTSPELL) + (PRECISEMOVEMENT | $TAKEDAMAGE) | 6DAMAGE | 5DAMAGE + PRECISEMOVEMENT
COMBAT[Nightmare_King]: (FIREBALL>1 | QUAKE>1 | SCREAM>1 | (MILDCOMBATSKIPS | CURSED) + SPELLS>1) + (FULLDASH | ANYDASH + MILDCOMBATSKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS) + NAILCOMBAT
COMBAT[Radiance]: FULLDASH + (FULLSHADOWDASH | QUAKE) + (FIREBALL>1 + UPSLASH | SCREAM>1 + UPSLASH | CURSED + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + UPSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + (UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
COMBAT[Crystal_Guardian]: UPSLASH | LEFTSLASH | RIGHTSLASH | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS + (DREAMNAIL + (SPELLS | FOCUS + SPORESHROOM | GLOWINGWOMB) | WEAVERSONG)
COMBAT[Pantheon_1]: COMBAT[Vengefly_King] + COMBAT[Gruz_Mother] + COMBAT[False_Knight] + COMBAT[Massive_Moss_Charger] + COMBAT[Hornet_1] + COMBAT[Gorb] + COMBAT[Dung_Defender] + COMBAT[Sanctum_Warrior] + COMBAT[Brooding_Mawlek] + COMBAT[Oro_and_Mato]
COMBAT[Pantheon_2]: COMBAT[Xero] + COMBAT[Crystal_Guardian] + COMBAT[Soul_Master] + COMBAT[Oblobbles] + COMBAT[Mantis_Lords] + COMBAT[Marmu] + COMBAT[Nosk] + COMBAT[Flukemarm] + COMBAT[Broken_Vessel] + COMBAT[Sheo]
COMBAT[Pantheon_3]: COMBAT[Hive_Knight] + COMBAT[Elder_Hu] + COMBAT[Collector] + COMBAT[God_Tamer] + COMBAT[Grimm] + COMBAT[Galien] + COMBAT[Grey_Prince_Zote] + COMBAT[Uumuu] + COMBAT[Hornet_2] + COMBAT[Sly]
COMBAT[Pantheon_4]: COMBAT[Enraged_Guardian] + COMBAT[Lost_Kin] + COMBAT[No_Eyes] + COMBAT[Traitor_Lord] + COMBAT[White_Defender] + COMBAT[Markoth] + COMBAT[Watcher_Knights] + COMBAT[Soul_Tyrant] + COMBAT[Pure_Vessel]
COMBAT[Pantheon_5]: COMBAT[Pantheon_1] + COMBAT[Pantheon_2] + COMBAT[Pantheon_3] + COMBAT[Pantheon_4] + COMBAT[Winged_Nosk] + COMBAT[Nightmare_King] + COMBAT[Radiance]
